citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a complete written contingency plan to provide for the humane handling, treatment,
transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. The current, local emergency
plan discusses veterinary care for animals in need, but doesn't list other reasonably anticipated emergencies or disasters,
specific tasks to be carried out in regards to animal welfare, a chain of command for who is responsible for performing
those tasks, and how response and recovery will be handled. Without a comprehensive written contingency plan in place,
animal welfare and health may suffer in the event of an emergency if staff is unprepared. Correct by creating a complete
written contingency plan in according with regulation 2.134.
No regulated animals were present at the time of inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.134 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility does not have a complete written contingency plan to provide for the humane handling, treatment, 
transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. The current, local emergency 
plan discusses veterinary care for animals in need, but doesn't list other reasonably anticipated emergencies or disasters, 
specific tasks to be carried out in regards to animal welfare, a chain of command for who is responsible for performing 
those tasks, and how response and recovery will be handled. Without a comprehensive written contingency plan in place, 
animal welfare and health may suffer in the event of an emergency if staff is unprepared. Correct by creating a complete 
written contingency plan in according with regulation 2.134. 
 
No regulated animals were present at the time of inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
